name: Phil Pelucha
what_you_do: Phil Pelucha is the Founder and CEO of Billionaires in Boxers, a globally recognized consultancy specializing in helping B2B businesses and sports brands achieve rapid revenue growth and authority status. He works at the intersection of private equity and commercial growth, building sales systems, pricing architecture, go-to-market strategy, and pipeline management.
who_you_serve: B2B businesses and sports brands, particularly growth-stage companies with founder-dependent revenue and no structured sales process.
offering: Revenue acceleration, portfolio growth partnerships, sales systems, pricing architecture, go-to-market strategy, pipeline management, and US market entry support.
bio: Philip Pelucha is the Founder and CEO of Billionaires in Boxers, internationally recognized as 'The Underdog Champion' and 'The Deal Doctor.' He is a business and sports consultant, TV host, and best-selling author who has built multiple 8-figure consultancies without paid ads or outside funding. His consultancy operates across 40+ countries, generating millions in revenue and media reach for clients.
business_focus: Helping B2B businesses and sports brands achieve rapid revenue growth and build authority status through structured commercial systems.
service_provided: Revenue acceleration, sales system design, pricing architecture, go-to-market strategy, pipeline management, US market entry, podcast network, business consulting, sports consulting
